Anguo county level city in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

sentences.english: This text is finished in Anguo of Hebei and China Agricultural University.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗在河北安國和中國農業大學完成。

sentences.english: He dreamt he went to an unknown country named Pagoda and got recognised by the king.
sentences.chinese: 他夢到他來到了一個陌生的國度，叫做槐安國。

sentences.english: The ground of our company Anne's country be the exchanges center of the biggest Chinese herbal medicine of north.
sentences.chinese: 本公司地處安國，是北方最大的中藥材交流中心。

sentences.english: He regularly makes the four-hour drive to Anguo to stock up on herbs.
sentences.chinese: 他經常開車四個小時到安國採購藥材。
